name: Clams With Prosciutto
keywords: dry white wine, littleneck clam, prosciutto, main course
recipeIngredient:
1/8 to 1/4 pound prosciutto or other
dry-cured ham, chopped

recipeInstructions.text:
Put the olive oil over medium heat in a
large pot that can be covered. Add garlic
and ham and stir. Add wine and clams.

Cover and cook, shaking the pot
occasionally, until the clams open, about
10 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley,
and serve.
